channel.title: Hello, Please help me my moparscape server!
channel.description:
Hello, i've made my own moparscape server because its amazing, best i seen yet moparscape is!, but how do i make myself a Moderator on it? I typed "::Mod 2" But i didn't have any crown, and where do i find a list of the Item's ID List? And also, how do i spawn items? Must i be an admin for it? Also, where are all the enemies gone? Please help me! Thank you for your time!
PS: How to i make my world Public? At the moment it is just me :(
-Yours Sincerely
Fizzpops[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 06:53:27 AM[/size][hr]Please someone help me! I really need peoples help :( :|

item.title: Hello, Please help me my moparscape server!
item.dc:creator: @Fizzpops Fizzpops
item.description:
@Fizzpops wrote:

WOW THANK YOU SOOO MUCH! But a question please? How do i spawn monsters to fight, its just me alone with some shop owners atm

And also, how can i get my server an IP so it becomes public?

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, Please help me my moparscape server!

item.title: Hello, Please help me my moparscape server!
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

ok…go into charachters and find your name then change player rights to 3
then to release you have to advertise on the advertisement section…and 127.0.0.1 is hybridscape…you will be alone

Read full topic
